extends java.lang.Object

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sendAllCards​(Player p, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
      It sends all the cards to the first client connected
      Parameters:
      p - is the first client connected
      cards - are all the cards implemented in the game
      Returns:
      2 or 3 cards, depending on the number of players of the game

    • sendChosenCards

      public java.lang.String sendChosenCards​(Player p, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> chosenCards)
      It sends the cards chosen from the first player to the other clients
      Parameters:
      p - is the player who will receive the chosen cards from the first client
      chosenCards - are the cards chosen
      Returns:
      the card chosen from the player p
